page.title: 16SPORTS IN BRAMHALL
page.content: {Bramhall Recreation Centre}has two sets of five tennis courts.The tennis courts are full size and there are ten courts in all.The floor of the courts are concrete and are good to play on.The Recreation centre has some sqaush courts.They have a bar near the sqaush courts and there is a table tennis room with 2 full size tables.On the playing fields there are two football pitches and three rugby posts.Over on the far side there is a strip of astro turf which the high school play cricket on.Inside there is a five a side hall and built into that is weight training room.Gymnastics are run on a Saturday and it is also possible to play badminton,Judo and Karate.One of the local hotels has a full size slate-bed snooker table on which members of the public can play.
